summary: Completed verification testing of the Equity Trust Portfolio platform Phase 1A implementation. All backend APIs remain fully functional (23/23 tests passed), and frontend UI components continue to work correctly with proper integration. The platform successfully delivers all requested Phase 1A features including Portfolio CRUD, Trust Profile with RM-ID system, educational content, AI assistant, templates, and authentication flows.
passed_tests: Backend health check endpoint returns healthy status
Backend root endpoint returns API information
Knowledge topics endpoint returns 10+ educational topics
Knowledge maxims endpoint returns 12+ maxims with proper structure
Knowledge relationships endpoint returns duty-right relationship pairs
Templates endpoint returns 7 trust document templates
Sources endpoint returns PDF source documents
AI Assistant chat endpoint responds with grounded GPT-4o responses
Protected endpoints correctly return 401 without authentication
User authentication and session management working
Dashboard stats endpoint returns portfolio/document/asset counts
Portfolio CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Trust profile creation and management with RM-ID system
Asset creation and management
Notice creation and management
Document creation with template support and trash/restore functionality
Document update creates new versions automatically
Document version history retrieval
PDF export functionality generates valid PDFs
Landing page loads with futuristic glassmorphism design and proper navigation
Learn page displays 5 educational modules with structured content
Maxims page displays 20 maxims with search functionality and study mode
Glossary page shows 28+ terms with alphabet navigation and search
Templates page properly redirects to login (authentication protected)
AI Assistant page loads with chat interface
All navigation elements are clickable and functional
Futuristic glassmorphism UI design implemented throughout
Command palette and Assistant drawer functionality (Ctrl+K, Ctrl+J shortcuts)
Disclaimer components properly displayed for educational use

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All UI components, navigation, and integrations working correctly)
